IAN Evatt has asked his Wanderers to become Super-men in tomorrows challenging trip to Priestfield.

articles.title: Ukraine crisis: Russia to appeal against football ban imposed by Fifa and Uefa - BBC
articles.description: The Russian Football Union says it will go to the Court of Arbitration for Sport to appeal against its ban from international competitions.
articles.content:
The Russian Football Union said it will go to the Court of Arbitration for Sport (Cas) to appeal against its ban from international competitions after the country's invasion of Ukraine.

articles.author: Matt Chivers
articles.title: Jon Rahm misses SHORTEST PUTT in PGA Tour history at Arnold Palmer Invitational - Golfmagic.com
articles.description: Jon Rahm hit one of the worst putts in recent memory on the PGA Tour during his first round of the Arnold Palmer Invitational.

articles.title: Newcastle's Amanda Staveley says it's UNFAIR Roman Abramovich is 'having his club taken away' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Newcastle United co-chief executive Amanda Staveley says it isn't fair that Chelsea owner Roman Abramovich is 'having his football club taken away'.
